body_html:
Sorry, I don't quite understand. I'm using only one while loop. Regarding to two loops, do you mean by

for i in range(4):
   self.story.append(tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None,None]))
  story_embedded.append(tf.nn.embedding_lookup(W, self.story[i]))

and

 for i in range(0,4):
   with tf.variable_scope("tt", reuse=True if i > 0 else None):
     _, story_state = rnn.dynamic_rnn(scell, story_embedded[i], dtype=tf.float32)    #!!!
    story_state_array.append(story_state)

?

body:
Sorry, I don't quite understand. I'm using only one while loop. Regarding to two loops, do you mean by 

``` python
for i in range(4):
   self.story.append(tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None,None]))
  story_embedded.append(tf.nn.embedding_lookup(W, self.story[i]))
```

and

``` python
 for i in range(0,4):
   with tf.variable_scope("tt", reuse=True if i > 0 else None):
     _, story_state = rnn.dynamic_rnn(scell, story_embedded[i], dtype=tf.float32)    #!!!
    story_state_array.append(story_state)   
```

?
